full_summary:
**Janitorial Services for RCMP Broadview Detachment**
=================================================================

### Request for Proposal

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) invites proposals from qualified bidders to provide janitorial services for the RCMP Broadview Detachment in Broadview, SK. The contract duration is expected to be two years with an option to extend for up to two additional one-year periods.

### Scope of Work

The selected bidder will be required to provide all necessary labor, materials, equipment, transportation, and daily site supervision to maintain the detachment's premises in a clean and safe condition. Cleaning services will be required five days a week.

### Security Requirements

This solicitation contains a security requirement. All bidders must comply with the security requirements outlined in the bid documents.

### Tender Requirements

* Tenders must be submitted to the RCMP Bid Receiving Unit as per the instructions provided in the Invitation to Tender (ITT).
* Bidders must comply with all requirements outlined in the bid solicitation to be declared responsive.
* The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award of a contract.

### Integrity Regime

The RCMP has adopted the Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada. As a result, the integrity provisions are being applied in RCMP contracting activities.

### Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

This tender is subject to the CKFTA and other free trade agreements negotiated by Canada. Bidders must comply with the requirements of these agreements.

### Indigenous Procurement

The federal Indigenous Business Directory (IBD) is an online resource for all levels of government and the private sector to identify Indigenous business capacity. Having a business profile in the IBD will increase your company's visibility and may provide additional business opportunities.
